page.title: 01General review north:FINTRY
page.content:
The area which people who live here, think of as Fintry, covers 4 squares of this Domesday Survey. See also:
{ 02640684, 02600684, 02560687. { Settlement is largely confined to the narrow valley cut by Endrick Water into the hills, that both surround and dominate all who live here. Locals say
{ "out of the world and into Fintry".}
Fintry north contains Culcreuch House and the most recent housing. Landuse is predominantly agricultural although few people actually work on the land.
The pages that follow cover aspects of why we live here, our work and play, our environment,together with some problems and benefits of rural living.
